body_html:
As a sidenote, I'm trying to build other configurations available in the solution like: MinSizeRel or RelWithDebInfo and get hit by compiler errors of the form:

d:\out\external\eigen_archive\eigen\src/Core/products/GeneralMatrixVector.h(351): fatal error C1060: compiler is out of heap space (compiling source file D:\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\kernels\matmul_op.cc)

body:
As a sidenote, I'm trying to build other configurations available in the solution like: MinSizeRel or RelWithDebInfo and get hit by compiler errors of the form:

`d:\out\external\eigen_archive\eigen\src/Core/products/GeneralMatrixVector.h(351): fatal error C1060: compiler is out of heap space (compiling source file D:\tensorflow\tensorflow\core\kernels\matmul_op.cc)`
